["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Chef 是一套自动化运维工具。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debianubuntu-用户","children":"Debian/Ubuntu 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["再选择你的 Debian/Ubuntu 版本，文本框中内容写进 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/chef.list"}]]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/chef.list","menus":[{"title":"Ubuntu/Debian 版本","items":[["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"release_name":"bionic"}],["Ubuntu 16.04 LTS",{"release_name":"xenial"}],["Ubuntu 14.04 LTS",{"release_name":"trusty"}],["Debian 12 (bookworm)",{"release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11 (bullseye)",{"release_name":"bullseye"}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/apt/stable {{release_name}} main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rhelcentos-用户","children":"RHEL/CentOS 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/chef.repo"}],"，内容为："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/chef.repo","code":"[chef-stable]
name=chef-stable
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/yum/stable/stable-el$releasever-x86_64/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.chef.io/chef.asc","codeLanguage":"ini"}]]}]

meta.title: Chef 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
